mapper.select: SELECT A.ishop, A.NAME, A.location, A.`open`,A.tel, round(ifnull(AVG(C.star),0)) AS star,A.`x`, A.`y`,if(D.ishop IS NULL , 0 , 1) AS isBook FROM t_shop AS A JOIN t_shop_menu AS B ON A.ishop = B.ishop JOIN t_shop_review C ON C.ishop = A.ishop LEFT JOIN t_shop_bookmark D ON A.ishop = D.ishop AND D.iuser = #{iuser} WHERE A.ishop = #{ishop}
SELECT a.ishop,a.ireview,c.nickname,a.star,a.review FROM t_shop_review a JOIN t_user c ON a.iuser = c.iuser WHERE a.ishop = #{ishop}
SELECT a.ireview, a.pic FROM t_shop_review_pic a JOIN t_shop_review b on a.ireview = b.ireview WHERE b.ishop = #{ishop}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_shop_review SET ishop = #{ishop}, iuser = #{iuser}, star = #{star}, review = #{review}
INSERT INTO t_shop_bookmark SET iuser= #{iuser}, ishop=#{ishop}
mapper.select: SELECT b.facility FROM t_shop_facilities a JOIN t_facilities b ON a.ifacil = b.ifacil WHERE a.ishop = #{ishop}
